summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 28th Avenue Northwest from West 95th Street to Triton Drive; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16722 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
